snippet.title: Yakuza 0 Director's Cut - Nintendo Switch 2 Trailer | Nintendo Direct
snippet.description:
An expanded version of Yakuza 0 is coming to Nintendo Switch 2 telling the origin story of Kazuma Kiryu and Goro Majima.

#IGN #NintendoSwitch2
